comment.author: 허현옥
comment.content: 아...저 있습니다. 시간이 언제 맞을지 모르지만... 용량이 100M 이 넘거든요. 메신저 통해서 받으셔야 될 것 같은데요..연락주세요.

post.content:
Hi,

I have problem with the Exadal install, and need to reinstall it, but the website doesn't have v 3.0 anymore. If anyone could you upload it, I would appriciate very much.

Thanks,
post.title: Anyone has Exadal Studio 3.0 installer?
